publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-752.1 Dr Winnie Ewing: Impact of the Scottish Adjacent Waters Boundaries Order, 1999—As an amendment to motion (S1M-752) in the name of Alex Johnstone, insert at end ", welcomes the Report and supports its findings and conclusions and calls upon the Scottish Executive to seek the co-operation of Her Majesty’s Government towards the implementation of its recommendations." Supported by: Mr Adam Ingram*, Fiona Hyslop*, Michael Matheson*
